mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, passwd, name, mobile) VALUES (#{email}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{mobile})
mapper.select: SELECT email, passwd, name, mobile FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND passwd = #{passwd}
SELECT email, passwd, name, mobile FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, mobile = #{mobile} WHERE email = #{email} AND passwd = #{passwd}
UPDATE member SET passwd = #{passwd} WHERE email = #{email}
